subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|カモ}} {{wikipedia|Duck}} [[File:Anas_crecca_landing_on_the_water.JPG|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|鴨}} (''kamo''): a pair of '''[[duck]]s'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かも}} {{unk|ja|sort=かも}}. Possibly alteration of {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=かも|-}} {{m|ja|浮かむ|tr=ukamu||to float}}, modern {{m|ja|浮かぶ|tr=ukabu}}. Alternatively, may derive from {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=かも|-}} {{ltc-l|雁|a type of wild goose}}, borrowed with the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading ''gan'', with initial ''g'' changing to ''k'' due to the avoidance of voiced stops at the start of Japanese words in older times, and final ''n'' changing to ''mu'' due to apparent lack of final ''n'' in {{cog|ojp|-}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かも|カモ}}

# a [[duck]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かも|slang}} {{qualifier|from the way ducks return to the same place and are thus easy to hunt}} a [[mark]] or easy [[target]] for a [[swindle]], someone who is likely to lose at [[gambling]] or other competition
# {{lb|ja|sort=かも|slang}} {{qualifier|from the good flavor of duck meat}} short for {{m|ja|鴨の味|tr=kamo no aji||duck flavor}}: a very good [[flavor]]; by extension, any remarkably good [[sensation]] or [[feeling]], particularly describing happy [[married]] [[life]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かも|slang}} {{qualifier|from the uniform of black clothing}} short for {{m|ja|黒鴨|tr=kurogamo||black duck}}: a [[male]] [[servant]], such as a [[butler]] or [[chauffeur]] (compare English {{m|en|penguin}})

subSections.title: Derived terms
See also
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|家鴨|あひる|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|鶩|あひる}}: a [[domestic duck]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かも}}

Probably from the ''duck'' sense above, in reference to the {{m|ja|鴨川|tr=Kamogawa|lit=duck river}} flowing through {{w|Kyoto}}.

subSections.title: Proper noun
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あひる}}

Rare alternative spelling for {{m|ja|家鴨|tr=ahiru}}.  See that entry for fuller details.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|あひる}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=あひる|rare}} {{alternative spelling of|nocap=1|lang=ja|sort=あひる|家鴨}}: a [[domestic duck]], ''[[Anas platyrhynchos]] var. domesticus'', descended from the [[mallard]]
